Springdale.Springdale Municipal Airport: Springdale Municipal Airport (IATA: SPZ, ICAO: KASG, FAA LID: ASG) is a public use airport in Washington County, Arkansas, United States. It is owned by the City of Springdale and located one nautical mile (2 km) southeast of its central business district. This airport is included in the National Plan of Integrated Airport Systems for 2011–2015, which categorized it as a general aviation facility.
